rule.condition: not (same(open in $L.file, "Suspended")) and (not (same(resolution in $L.file, resolution in $L.file.save)) and not (same(resolution in $L.file, NULL)))
rule.conditionDesc: ( open in CurrentRecord != "Suspended" AND ( resolution in CurrentRecord != resolution in SavedRecord AND resolution in CurrentRecord != NULL))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Solution">resolution</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Solution">resolution</FieldName></Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Solution">resolution</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Status via JavaScript (when ( Status in CurrentRecord != "Suspended" AND ( Solution in CurrentRecord != Solution in SavedRecord AND Solution in CurrentRecord != NULL)))
